DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective project determine effect decrease sedentary behavior work least 3hrs/day use treadmill ( walk stand ) sit-to-stand ( stand ) workstation health overweight office worker .
DOC.brief_title: Modifying Workplace Decrease Sedentary Behavior Improve Health
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index great 25 kg.m2 Does engage structured physical activity last least 30 min 2 days/week Employed fulltime sedentary desk job . No major orthopedic limitation medical condition prevents walk stand treadmill work sitstand workstation .
